import math

def find_knapsack_items(n, W, weights):
    l = [[weights[i], i + 1] for i in range(n)]
    l.sort()
    total_weight = 1
    start = 0
    end = n - 1
    inf = -1
    ans = -1
    for i in range(n):
        if l[i][0] >= math.ceil(W / 2) and l[i][0] <= W:
            inf = i
            ans = 1
            start = i
            end = i
            break
        elif l[i][0] < math.ceil(W / 2):
            total_weight += l[i][0]
            if total_weight >= math.ceil(W / 2):
                end = i
                ans = 1
                break
    if ans != -1:
        selected_items = [l[i][1] for i in range(start, end + 1)]
        return (len(selected_items), selected_items)
    else:
        return None

import math

def find_knapsack_items(n, W, weights):
    l = [[weights[i], i + 1] for i in range(n)]
    l.sort()
    total_weight = 0
    start = 0
    end = n - 1
    inf = -1
    ans = -1
    for i in range(n):
        if l[i][0] >= math.ceil(W / 2) and l[i][0] <= W:
            inf = i
            ans = 1
            start = i
            end = i
            break
        elif l[i][0] < math.ceil(W / 2):
            total_weight += l[i][0]
            if total_weight >= math.ceil(W / 2):
                end = i
                ans = 1
                break
    if ans != -1:
        selected_items = [l[i][-1] for i in range(start, end + 1)]
        return (len(selected_items), selected_items)
    else:
        return None
